name: Student's Mom
text: don't you have to go to school early today?

name: Student
text: Crap! Mom, why won't you wake me up earlier.

name: Student
text: I have an appointment with teacher before class.

name: Student
text: Do you know what will happen if I didn't make it in time huh?

name: Student's Mom
text: Then, hurry up and get your breakfast.
Rush in the toilet and wash the face up.

name: Student
text: I'm good with just bread, bye mom!
